LOOPED

by Jason Bullough

Released Apr 30, 2004
Players 1
License Unknown

Download ROM

Description

The idea behind the game is to create concentric loops using the random pieces given. The pieces are right angles top left/top right/bottom left/bottom right and horizontal and vertical pieces. A further random piece that can appear is a star: this piece can be used to remove any item you have placed on the gameboard. You can not however remove a map screen block. If you do not wish to utilise a star piece simply move the cursor over a map board piece or a blank area and use the item.
